text.headline: RAG
text.text: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) combines the power of AI with real-time data retrieval, enabling models to generate highly accurate and context-aware content. By seamlessly integrating up-to-date information from vast knowledge sources, RAG enhances the precision and relevance of AI-generated outputs, making it ideal for tasks requiring deep knowledge and dynamic responses.

text.headline: Models
text.text: A large language model is a computational model capable of language generation or other natural language processing tasks. As language models, LLMs acquire these abilities by learning statistical relationships from vast amounts of text during a self-supervised and semi-supervised training process.

text.headline: Mistral
text.text: Mistral is a state-of-the-art text generation model in the realm of generative AI. Designed for high performance and versatility, Mistral excels at producing coherent and contextually relevant text. Whether you need creative content, technical writing, or engaging dialogue, Mistral delivers with precision and fluency, setting new standards for natural language generation.

text.headline: Llama
text.text: Introducing the family of LLaMA model for text generation—an advanced solution in generative AI. Designed to deliver coherent, contextually rich text, LLaMA leverages state-of-the-art algorithms to produce high-quality, human-like language outputs. Perfect for a range of applications from creative writing to automated content creation, LLaMA transforms how you interact with AI, making it an invaluable tool for generating compelling and meaningful text.

text.headline: GPT
text.text: GPT models revolutionize text generation with advanced generative AI. By understanding context and producing coherent, relevant text, they enable seamless content creation, from engaging articles to creative writing, enhancing productivity and creativity across various applications.

text.headline: Embedding Models
text.text: Embedding models are high-dimensional vectors representing tokens in a way that captures their semantic meaning and relationships. Embeddings enable LLMs to understand context and nuances in data, whether it's text, images, or videos. The quality of embeddings significantly impacts the performance of LLMs.

text.headline: BAAI/bge-large-en
text.text: bge is short for BAAI general embedding.

text.headline: text-embedding-3-large
text.text: The text-embedding-3-small is optimized for latency and storage. On the other hand, text-embedding-3-large is a good option for higher accuracy, and we can also take advantage of the new dimensions parameter to keep the embedding at 1536 instead of the native size of 3072 without impacting the overall performance.

text.headline: RAG Evaluation
text.text: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) evaluation measures the effectiveness of AI models that combine information retrieval with text generation. By assessing both the accuracy of retrieved data and the quality of generated responses, RAG evaluation ensures that your AI systems deliver precise, contextually relevant content, enhancing user experience and trust.

text.headline: HR BOT
text.text: The innovation office has developed a proof-of-concept (POC) project called “HR BOT” that aims to provide quick and accurate answers to questions related to HR policy. The project uses LLM Models, RAG(Retrieval augmented generation) and multi-agent conversations to create a chatbot that can interact with users in a natural and engaging way. The project demonstrates the potential of using advanced natural language processing techniques to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of HR services.
